summary: KrebsOnSecurity. com turns 15 years old today.  Maybe it's indelicate to celebrate the birthday of a cybercrime blog that mostly publishes bad news, but happily many of 2024's most engrossing security stories were about bad things happening to bad guys...
title: Happy 15th Anniversary, KrebsOnSecurity!
